channel.title: Which font sets are for what
channel.description:
Ok i have: CharsNPC CharsTrade CharsChat CharsChat/font2 CharsChat/fontsmall CharsChat2 CharsChat2/font2 CharsChat2/fontsmall Charsrs2 Charsrs22 Charsrsc
I am using: [b]CharsChat2[/b] for normal chat box so far i have found some errors in it thou like '0', and ' '(space) being wrong
Am i using the wrong one, also what are these others for, please describe i barely know how to play the game.

item.title: Which font sets are for what
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

dark_sniper:

no the text was updated when aryan went dead the 0 now has a cross though it

yep fixed that[br][size=1]Posted at: July 24, 2006, 04:10:08 AM[/size][hr][quote=“masquerader, post:3, topic:5945”]if you turn checkoutline off, the zero should still work, and you need to turn max space to 2 pixels or so between the pixels

charsnpc i made for the talking npcs

charstrade is specifically for trading because the tops of the letters are chopped off

fontsmall is for the stat chars

charsrs2 is the main screen text

lol, is this about i-bot?[/quote]
lol, yes this is about ibot

what is “checkoutline”, in ibot we bitmask and bitmap together. so their are wildcards, bitmask has to match, bitmask cna;t match, and 3 seperat tolernces.

would “checkoutline” surround each bitmask ‘match’ with bitmask ‘cantmatch’ s[br][size=1]Posted at: July 24, 2006, 04:12:59 AM[/size][hr]http://rapidshare.de/files/26808064/Untitled2.avi.html[br][size=1]Posted at: July 24, 2006, 04:13:51 AM[/size][hr]checkoutline hmmm!![br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 02:54:41 PM[/size][hr]When your using charsrs2, to scan for text that appears on the top dependent on the mouse position.

you use checkoutline?
what tolerance?
what “max pixels space between chars”?

i added a variation of checkoutline
check verticaloutline
check horzontaloutline
also a set to the nomatch (-1,-1) none
(0,0) set all pixles that aren’t “match” to “nomatch”
(1,0) set all pixles between width-1>x>1 to nomatch

for bitmask searchs

Is scar always correct on what the return text is?

Read full topic
item.source: Which font sets are for what

item.title: Which font sets are for what
item.dc:creator: @masquerader masquerader
item.description:
@masquerader wrote:

if you turn checkoutline off, the zero should still work, and you need to turn max space to 2 pixels or so between the pixels

charsnpc i made for the talking npcs

charstrade is specifically for trading because the tops of the letters are chopped off

fontsmall is for the stat chars

charsrs2 is the main screen text

lol, is this about i-bot?

Read full topic
